text: And to Lot We gave judgement the ability to judge decisively between opposing parties and knowledge; and We delivered him from the town which had been committing that is whose inhabitants had been committing deeds of vileness by way of homosexual intercourse hazelnut-hurling and bird-games and other things. Truly they were a folk of evil people saw’ is the verbal noun of sā’ahu ‘he harmed him’ the opposite of sarrahu ‘he delighted him’ immoral.
